programme.desc: What gives animals extraordinary powers? We like to think of ourselves as the peak of evolution--but what if we're wrong?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: NASA scientists, former astronauts and secret government files all point to the conclusion that there has been contact.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: People on every continent have claimed to see Bigfoot's footprints. And ancient myths and legends speak of an ape-like giant stalking the earth. What if, as Ancient Astronaut theorists believe, there is evidence to connect Bigfoot with an alien species?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Lurking in the oceans are creatures that defy explanation, such as octopuses that can edit their own DNA or animals that can regenerate their entire brain; examining if the oceans are acting as a giant petri dish for alien genetic experimentation.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Spanish Conquistadors obliterated the historical record of the Maya in the 16th century, but did they wipe out evidence that ancient people traveled to the Americas from all over the world, and in flying craft provided by extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Serpent gods are found in the traditions of Mesopotamia, Central and South America, India, China, Japan and the Bible; a look at if these stories describe a race of reptile-like extraterrestrials instead.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Mayan civilization dominated Central America for nearly 2000 years, but by the 9th century A.D., the great Mayan cities were abandoned, and the Mayan people vanished. What could have happened to this advanced culture?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient alien theorists speculate about the depiction of light bulbs in Egyptian hieroglyphs and the batteries discovered among Mesopotamian artifacts and whether extraterrestrials introduced electricity to ancient peoples.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: A locked cell phone held the clues to the mystery of the skeleton buried on a farm.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: Police body cam video captures the cries of an Army sergeant as she cradles her dying husband in her arms; despite the happy outward appearance of the young military couple, investigators soon accuse the wife of directing a murder-for-hire plot.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: Dentist Dr. Kendra Hatcher was in a deep romance with fellow doctor Ricardo Paniagua when she was brutally murdered in the garage of her apartment building.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: Popular college senior Samantha Josephson goes missing after a night of socializing at a bar area popular with students; tragically, her body is found 24 hours later with more than 100 stab wounds.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: While the Boston underworld was in chaos in the 1970s, Whitey Bulger schemed and killed his way through the ranks to become the most famous gangster in Boston history as well as the the subject of the longest manhunt in U.S. history.

programme.title: Gangsters: America's Most Evil
programme.desc: With a taste of success and the lure of easy money, Thelma started transporting cocaine and heroin between Los Angeles and Philadelphia.

programme.title: Gangsters: America's Most Evil
programme.desc: Barry Mills found his calling as the leader of the white supremacist prison gang the Aryan Brotherhood.

programme.title: Gangsters: America's Most Evil
programme.desc: Maria Leon commanded a reign of terror in L.A.; the criminal underworld created by her murderous brood of children.

programme.title: Gangsters: America's Most Evil
programme.desc: Pistol Pete and his underlings incorporated the gang Sex, Money, Murder in an effort to launder drug money and expanded their operations outside New York.

programme.title: Gangsters: America's Most Evil
programme.desc: Carlos Lehder uses the Bahamian island of Norman's Cay as a headquarters as he smuggles cocaine from Colombia to the United States.

programme.title: Monster in My Family
programme.desc: Amber and Michelle Yates--daughters of serial killer Richard Yates, speak.

programme.title: Monster in My Family
programme.desc: Cindy Brown reveals how her childhood sweetheart and husband, Bobby Joe Long, evolves into a fiend who rapes more than 50 women, ultimately killing 10.

programme.title: Monster in My Family
programme.desc: Richard Beasley was a conman and serial killer who posed as a preacher and in 2011, posted advertisements on Craigslist to entice men to work with him on his farm.

programme.title: Monster in My Family
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, Drew Peterson's eldest son shares for the first time his memories of being raised by the man who he once admired above all others, his father.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: Despite Josh Hamilton's historic first round, Justin Morneau goes on to defeat Hamilton in the final to win the Home Run Derby at Yankee Stadium.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 3/22/17: Team United States takes home their first World Baseball Classic Championship in 2017 with an 8-0 win over Team Puerto Rico at Dodger Stadium

programme.title: This Week in Baseball
programme.desc: On this edition of This Week in Baseball, the Bash Brothers mash to help Oakland clinch a postseason spot and Ryne Sandberg gets the Cubs back to playing October baseball again.

programme.title: Prime 9
programme.desc: Rickey Henderson, Mike Schmidt, and Don Mattingly highlight the Prime 9 All 1980's Team.

programme.title: Baseball's Seasons
programme.desc: Royals win in seven amid first base controversy. Pete Rose becomes baseball's hit king.

programme.title: All-Star Highlights
programme.desc: Take a look at the 1990 MLB All-Star Game which endured 85 minutes of rain delays. Julio Franco put the only runs on the board in the American League's victory over the National League.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: "Hunter Greene fans nine in no-hit start vs. Bucs, but the Pirates come out on top without a hit.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: At the 2016 Home Run Derby, Giancarlo Stanton wins head-to-head matchups against Robinson Cano, Mark Trumbo and Todd Frazier to win the contest.

programme.title: Play Ball
programme.desc: Relive an amazing season with the best moments of the year on this week’s episode of Play Ball!

programme.title: MLB Network Presents
programme.desc: MLB Network provides an inside look into the life and story of Billy Bean on the latest installment of MLB Network Presents

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: David Ortiz becomes the second player in history to hit his 499th and 500th homers in the same game.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: Ken Holtzman homers and pitches 7 2/3 strong innings to earn the win in the A's Game 4 victory.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: Future Hall of Famer Fred McGriff goes 3-for-5 with a home run and 4 RBIs, leading the Braves to the NL Pennant.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: Down six runs going into the 9th inning, the Pirates stage an epic comeback. Brian Giles walks up to the plate and smashes a walk-off grand slam, stunning with Astros in a 9-8 win for the Pirates.

programme.title: MLB Network Countdown
programme.desc: Relive baseball's most memorable moments from 2000 to 2009, including record-breaking home runs, perfect games, historic World Series wins, and more.

programme.title: Epic Innings
programme.desc: Relive epic October finishes from 2010 to 2019.

programme.title: Epic Moments
programme.desc: My Oh My! Relive the story of the 1995 Seattle Mariners, a team led by Ken Griffey Jr, Randy Johnson and Edgar Martinez. Thrilling postseason moments, interviews from former players and more highlight this in-depth look at an unforgettable season.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: Pujols goes 5-for-5 with three home runs in a comeback win against the Cubs.

programme.title: World Series Film
programme.desc: This World Series Film showcases the 1960 matchup between the Pirates and the Yankees. Entering the bottom of the 9th inning of Game 7 tied at 9, Pirates second baseman Bill Mazeroski smashed a walk-off home run to crown the team as World Series champions

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 7/15/13: Yoenis Céspedes takes home the title in the 2013 Home Run Derby. He hit a total of 32 homers and takes out Bryce Harper in the final round.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: Cleveland rallies from 12 runs down to win, 15-14, on Jolbert Cabrera's walk-off single in the 11th inning.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: The Astros clinch the World Series behind Framber Valdez's nine strikeouts in a 4-1 win in Game 6

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 10/20/82: With the championship on the line, Bruce Sutter comes into the game in the 8th inning to blank the Brewers. The Cardinals captured their ninth World Series win in a dramatic Game 7 win at Busch Stadium.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 10/15/86: The Astros scored three runs in the 1st inning and took the lead deep into the 9th, until the Mets retaliated with three runs to send the game into extras. Fast forward to the top of the 16th when Ray Knights hit a go-ahead knock and the rest is history!

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: Work continues on the Volkswagen delivery bus, as Shorty gets down in the paint booth on this giant beast; it's time to get this bus across the finish line with a new motor, new suspension, new stance and brand new wheels and tires.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: The owner, Sanders, has had some bad luck with this '56 Belair going from shop to shop, and he still doesn't have his family dream car ready. Shorty's shop is the last stop. Joel and Shorty make sure this car is ready for the road.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: Paul decides to take one of his prized 1959s and go full lowrider with hydraulics and a full custom lowrider paint job; Shorty's wife Lupe has a 1992 Mustang GT 5.0, and Shorty has a honey do list to get this car back to its original glory.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Every so often a visionary comes along, and with their imagination, grit and perseverance, they manage to fail and leave a mark on automotive history.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Rob Corddry and Emelia Harford tell two stories of Japanese visionaries who managed to bring their visions to life and change the car world, despite obstacles.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Rule benders and sneaky geniuses: these are stories of creative risk takers who know that sometimes you have to break the rules to be the hero.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: There are a million ways to modify a car, but few like these stories. From a manufacturer creating a narrow-use case spec, to one guy making a complete unicorn in his garage, we celebrate some forgotten oddballs of the mod world.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Certain men in the history of cars were just made from different stuff; these two drivers achieved insane feats against impossible odds to prove that they are legends among legends.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Taking a trip back in time to the early days of the automobile, when the first enterprising car enthusiasts laid the foundations for the car world today.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Some cars carry powerful myths with them long after they are gone; these are stories of cars whose intriguing legends have endured long past the metal they are made from.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: The quest for speed has been ingrained in humans since the birth of the wheel; these are stories of people who gathered like-minded speed freaks and created outlaw cultures of pushing the limits of public roads.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.desc: Erik Estrada wants to transform his wood-paneled ’83 Rolls-Royce limo.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.desc: Team Unique takes on a major project for Nick Cannon's 1967 Chevelle.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.desc: Geraldo Rivera brings his 2004 Tacoma to Team Unique.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.desc: The team flips a Range Rover makeover for rapper Fat Joe.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.desc: DJ Khaled asks Will to take a Wrangler and make it the most unique ride.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.desc: Team Unique transforms Mike Epps' Camaro into a custom dream ride.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Former NFL player Chad Lewis brings Dave an R8 Spyder for customizations.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The shop gears up for a big show and Dave's plans for an AC go south.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave turns a client's outdated '53 Chevy into a modern, badass hot rod.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The shop's talents are pushed to the max when a '33 Ford Tudor arrives.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The crew attempts to make history as they make a truck that doesn't exist.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and the crew start on a 1966 Corvette, but his client doesn't want the color to be anywhere close to its original green.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The client is on board with the chosen shade of green, and the car moves into the paint booth.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A past client returns with a 1965 Mustang Fastback, and though he likes the stock look, he wants to upgrade the drivetrain, instrumentation and as many modern amenities as possible; the assembly team gets a crash course in engine tuning.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: An active-duty serviceman and his father are finally ready to finish their 1951 Ford pickup.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The 1951 pickup is painted and ready for final assembly.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Fixing a '32 Ford that caught fire after an accident.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave designs a Mustang for the ages to compete in the Optima Challenge; the build includes a new front facia and hood and redesigning the rear end.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The 1965 Mustang makes its way through the metal shop and is now ready for paint and final assembly; making it function will test even the Kindig crew.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave has decided that the time is right to design his own concept car from scratch; it's a huge job that involves all the different departments in the shop.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: All the Concept Corvette's elements are built and assembled, but Dave needs to find a buyer; a rock 'n' roll icon brings his '34 Ford coupe to the shop.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A simple repaint of a 1964 Corvette careens into much more after Dave upsells the client on a couple of design features, and the crew finds some damage underneath the original paint; the owner of an iconic Ford GTX1 tasks Dave with solving a dilemma.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: An abandoned 1967 C10 that has been sitting for years has been sold to a client who wants a few new touches, but closer inspection reveals more work is needed.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave convinces the client to make the 1967 C10 truck into a convertible; Kevin takes on a new personal project with a Cadillac Escalade.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The engineering on the convertible C10 works in theory, but making it work in practice is the next step; a team brings in a replica 1967 Cobra with a bad engine.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Of all the different years and generations of the VW Bug, there is one that stands out among the rest -- the Hebmüller; there are maybe 200 of them left, so in addition to being hard to find, they are truly the holy grail of VWs.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The build continues, and the challenge is to keep what makes the car a Hebmueller intact, while taking bold steps to turn it into a hot rod. Dave keeps the traditional two-tone exterior, but modifying it to an automatic is a huge test for the shop.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Normally when Kindig-It Design attends a car show, their cars are the ones being judged. But this time around, Dave and Kev hold the keys and will have to select the top 10 builders out of the hundreds of cars that arrive for the show.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave's clients have owned a car since they got married 25 years ago and want it restored so they can enjoy it for another 25. While the shop isn't really into straight restorations, adding some custom pieces and paint makes them "say yes" to the pro.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave is thrilled with the latest build, while KevDogg is barely lukewarm; Dave has done double-cab VWs, Bugs and Karmann Ghias, but now he is taking on something completely different, and even more rare.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Matching the two-tone paint job is the challenge of the day as the '53 Barn Door Deluxe build carries on; custom trim, a new, more powerful engine, 22 windows and a custom interior all come together to make this surprise worth the wait.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and the guys at Kindig-It proved they could execute Dave's vision of his production Corvette, but now that a few have sold, they have to get them completely finished.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and the team put the finishing touches on the first-ever Kindig CF Corvettes to complete a lifelong dream; however, the clients argue about who will get the first one, all in advance of a once-in-a-lifetime debut at SEMA.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and Kevin, who have been an absolute treat for automotive enthusiasts for years, come back to the SEMA show with something special on their minds.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A Beatles fanatic challenges Dave to paint a modern Rolls-Royce to match the car John Lennon commissioned in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and Kev take the show as far east as they have ever gone and head to Lake George, New York, for the Adirondack Nationals; the town shuts down for the car show, attracting some of the best on the east coast.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A 1970s Pantera is an iconic sportscar, but once Dave gets his hands on it, the style will never be the same; the client has given Dave free rein to change the car as he sees fit, but has one request: he is 6'4" and can't comfortably get in it.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: With the whole team in agreement over the body mods, the crew must make the designs into reality; their list of tasks include bulging out the fenders, creating a spider-shaped exhaust, executing the stretch and getting the car to body.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The Pantera is almost done, but nothing is simple with this car; Dave and Kev get a chance to upgrade their semi rig.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A 1971 Chevy Nova with tremendous pedigree arrives at the shop to get classic Kindig-It styling cues; Dave wants to make this car into a hardtop; tucked-in bumpers, front valance and a new engine provide a good test for the crew.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Will makes miracles happen, and Dave decides to make a wholesale change to the car's color; challenges mount at each stage of the build, and the upholstery shop changes up their routine as the client arrives for a reveal years in the making.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: While the shop perfects its process in building the CF1s, word about the car spreads and potential buyers line up; the latest client has a big problem when he can't choose the perfect color combination.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and Kev take the show to the Midwest, as more than 2,500 cars descend on the Summit Motorsports drag strip for a weekend of fun; Kev gets a ride in a lean, mean drag racing machine; Dave steps up his autocross game.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A client enlists Dave on a mission from God to make his dreams of a father/son road trip along Route 66 come true; getting the client's mechanically unsound reproduction of the Bluesmobile ready for the road will test the crew's mettle.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Kevin Schiele breathes new life into a semi-hauler by giving it a visual and functional upgrade that impeccably reflects his expertise in trucks.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave finally realizes one of his dreams by opening the Kindig Academy.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and the team determine that a '69 Camaro requires a full rebuild.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The Camaro build hits a snag as the crew tries to get the engine dialed in.

programme.title: The Perfect Mother
programme.desc: Linda, a determined mother, faces the daily struggles of raising her son amidst the unpredictable presence of her husband. When a series of hardships push her to the edge, Linda's plea for assistance leads to Ahmad being taken into CPS custody.

programme.title: Bars
programme.desc: A woman's idyllic world comes crashing down when she's sentenced to life in prison for a crime she didn't commit. She soon finds strength and solace among a group of tight-knit inmates known as the Pretty Girls.

programme.title: Kill Em With a Smile
programme.desc: A dying woman finds that the only thing that scares her more than her own death is her husband finding a new person to spend his days with.

programme.title: Keisha
programme.desc: Struggling to take care of her son and pay bills, Keisha is forced to turn to exotic dancing to keep from sliding deeper into poverty.

programme.title: Lacee
programme.desc: A hot, up-and-coming, all-female R&B group embarks on a journey of sex, power and music business betrayal on their road to the big time.

programme.title: Lacee: Rise 2 the Top
programme.desc: After a run-in with the girl group LACEE, Karin decides to step out on her own as a solo artist. As she preps for her solo debut, a former lover brings out a new artist that will compete for the reigning spot as the new R&B diva.

programme.title: Loyalty
programme.desc: An independent drug dealer learns his girlfriend used to date his competitor and believes they might still be messing around.

programme.title: Loyalty 2 the Return of T Bone
programme.desc: After making bail, the notorious killer and drug lord T Bone returns to the streets of Harlem, NY to clean up the family business and tie all loose ends. But once again the tables are turned when T Bone is betrayed by someone close.

programme.title: No Disrespect
programme.desc: Milk runs the streets efficiently in his father's absence. After 15 years in prison, his father, Bull, returns to claim what is rightfully his.

programme.title: One 2 Zero
programme.desc: In the near future, a machine rights activist kidnaps a newly created android to prove it is a conscious being and liberate it from corporate greed.

programme.title: Art of Love
programme.desc: After a government contracted hit goes wrong, the collateral damage causes Lucas Alba to retire. He may be done, but his past eventually catches up with him, putting his life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Toxic Traits
programme.desc: Eric is a prodigal son, who meets Regina on a dating app and they fall in love. The two seem like a match made in heaven, except for Eric's suspicious mother. Events begin to unfold and Regina's true nature comes to light.

programme.title: For the Love of Christmas
programme.desc: Rashad Williams faces down the pressures of making a dramatic career choice and getting married to Lauren—and all before Christmas Day.

programme.title: Asking for a Friend
programme.desc: A successful engineer struggles in the love department. In denial that his girlfriend is cheating on him, Jeff gets teased by his homeboys until they convince him to try this new dating app and get back out there prove his value to his girlfriend.

programme.title: Naughty or Nice
programme.desc: Melody, an exotic dancer, and her doctor boyfriend, Patrick, prepare to spend the holidays with Patrick's family. When they arrive, they are met by Patrick's overprotective judgmental mother, and she unleashes her wrath on Melody, as she's not good enough for her son.

programme.title: Smash and Dash
programme.desc: Clarence, a Chef from Chicago, is very passionate about two things, food and love. After being jilted at the altar, Clarence's friends Lakeith and Buddy, immediately urge him to get back into the dating pool, but under one condition, Clarence needs to hook up with as many women as he possibly can through a dating app without falling in love.

programme.title: Wannabe a Star
programme.desc: This time, everything is upgraded. New students, new location and new problems for Dr. Cool. Lardel has hired a spy to watch him, his hustle is beginning to unravel, and family is becoming uneasy, and his heart is feeling conviction.

programme.title: When It Rains
programme.desc: While Todd is away at graduate school and with his wife back at home, the beautiful Sharon suddenly appears within his tempting reach.

programme.title: When Love Comes Knocking
programme.desc: Veronica has never been with a good man who respects and protects her. So she's skeptical when real love arrives. Is it too good to be true?

programme.title: Weapons of Warfare
programme.desc: Raised in a religious household, a young man decides to pursue a life on the street, only to be torn between his family and the leader of his gang.

programme.title: Trapped in the Game
programme.desc: Polo is a young desperate hustler looking to make some quick cash. However, the only way he knows how to make cash quickly, is pimping out young women with the help of his crew. When of his crew starts taking girls off the street, the heat threatens to bring down his whole operation.

programme.title: The Queens Ball
programme.desc: A ruthless queenpin prepares for her 50th birthday party, unaware that she's the target of an assassination plot. Will her big day become a bloodbath?

programme.title: A Holiday for Harmony
programme.desc: Jaxon Moore is a struggling arcade bar owner with debt and facing a possible shutdown before the holiday season. When his sister dies in a car crash, he becomes the guardian of his young niece Harmony, who inherited a trust fund from her late mother.

programme.title: Rain for Christmas
programme.desc: A decision is made by Malik to bring his girlfriend home to Houston for Christmas. When she is met by his family, it is thought by them that he is all wrong for her. The grandpa's nurse, Rain, is met by Malik, and the true meaning of love and what is really wanted for Christmas are soon realized by him.

programme.title: Naughty or Nice
programme.desc: Melody, an exotic dancer, and her doctor boyfriend, Patrick, prepare to spend the holidays with Patrick's family. When they arrive, they are met by Patrick's overprotective judgmental mother, and she unleashes her wrath on Melody, as she's not good enough for her son.

programme.title: Christmas With da Fam
programme.desc: After Malcom proposes to Serenity, she takes him home to meet her family for the holidays. The spirit is alive, until they discover that Serenity's ex Denzel is living with her family after a house fire. A rivalry develops between Malcolm and Denzel that ends up in a hilarious battle of wits over the holiday weekend.

programme.title: Mixed Christmas
programme.desc: Aurora wants to enjoy the holidays this year in some warmth and sunshine, and invites her three best friends to Miami for a Christmas trip to remember. When they arrive at their AirBnb, they discover it's been double booked by Aurora's ex-girlfriend and her new partner Axel. They have no choice but to combine their plans, and celebrate the holiday together.

programme.title: Truth Talks
programme.desc: A bold series exploring provocative topics with celebrity interviews and voices of the voiceless.

programme.title: Faceoff on Fox Soul
programme.desc: FOX SOUL Faceoff talks about those hot topic issues a lot of us are afraid to talk about!

programme.title: You Can't Erase Me
programme.desc: Legendary female battle rapper, Sparky D's rise to stardom is quickly cut short by a tumultuous drug addiction.

programme.title: Truth Talks
programme.desc: A bold series exploring provocative topics with celebrity interviews and voices of the voiceless.

programme.title: The Isiah Factor Uncensored
programme.desc: News anchor and reporter Isiah Carey tackles hot-button news issues with a no-holds-barred attitude.

programme.title: Portia
programme.desc: The co-founders of Melanated Campout Jocelyn McCants, Shunte McClellan and Cayela Wimberly-White go to "Camp Portia," where they teach Portia tips to survive in the wilderness.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqué, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.

programme.title: Divorce Court

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqué, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Ben and Darlene are excited to share their good news with the family, but Neville and Jackie, and Aldo and Harris, share their own very similar news.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The Conners gear up for a megawedding; Jackie & Neville, Darlene & Ben, Harris & Aldo are planning for a big day, but discover that some of the couples may not be on the same page.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: In an effort to save money, Darlene and Ben, and Jackie and Neville head off on their joint honeymoon, where their cost-saving measures contribute to a tension-filled getaway.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: When Jackie moves in with Neville, he shows up to their home with an excess of animals from his vet office; Darlene and Ben argue Darlene is turning into her father.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mark is anxious to get his driver's license; Darlene attempts to teach Mark to drive, but her frantic energy sends him running to Ben for help; Harris meets a new guy online.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: When a relative passes away unexpectedly, the family must debate about who should gain custody of a jaded nephew, who is just shy of his 18th birthday.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Problems arise on Beverly Rose's first day of kindergarten; Becky and Darlene have a disagreement.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris takes a stand on an issue that ruffles a few feathers in Darlene's new neighborhood.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene receives a promotion, but she quickly learns the fancy title is not all it's cracked up to be; when Louise loses her job at Casita Bonita, an opportunity arises.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Jackie must come to terms with her mother becoming ill; Darlene's job hunt proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene, Ben, Becky and Beverly Rose move into the new house, where Darlene implements a new set of rules.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan meets his in-laws for the first time when Louise's family comes to visit; Darlene helps Becky with a parenting problem.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The death of a beloved teacher from Dan and Jackie's high school brings old classmates together.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene and Ben get into a fight and ignore Becky's boundaries in the house; Dan accuses Jackie of losing all of their home videos.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene has issues with Dan's plumbing work in her new house; Jackie tries to find a caregiver for Bev.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene continues her search for a new job; Becky is desperate to spend more time with Beverly Rose.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris makes a big announcement; Ben is overwhelmed with family responsibilities.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris takes her anger out on Darlene; Dan and Louise spend an entire day in bed together.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mark fights for a spot in the Lanford High chamber orchestra; Jackie puts a lottery machine in the Lunch Box.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan and Jackie take a road trip to a hardware wholesaler in Oklahoma; Darlene heads out of town and leaves behind a plethora of to-do notes for Becky and Ben.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Louise gets into a feud with Becky after accidentally sending a rude message in the family text thread.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene figures out a plan to afford Mark's college tuition; Jackie and Louise try to help Becky meet a guy.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Neville confronts Jackie about loaning Dan money; Darlene attempts to play matchmaker for Mark.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: As Mark's graduation approaches, he considers his relationship with his father; Louise plans a big graduation ceremony at the Lunch Box.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: A sudden turn of events forces the Conners to face their daily struggles in a way they never have before.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene is in for one surprise after another when David introduces his girlfriend, Blue (Juliette Lewis), and mentions that Mark and Harris will be spending the weekend with them.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: It's Halloween, the favorite time of year for the Conners, but an email from the school banning certain costumes, including Mark's, sets off an argument between Dan and Darlene.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Geena learns D.J. hasn't been taking Mary to church while she's been away, so she insists they go as a family.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: A family member drops a life-changing announcement; Dan suspects that Becky isn't sticking to her end of the deal about her drinking; Darlene continues her job search.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: With Mark and Mary's help, Jackie convinces Dan to build a chicken coop so the family can eat organic eggs.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan questions Peter's motives when he learns about the pricey Christmas gift Jackie bought for her new unemployed beau. Elsewhere, Mark and Mary write up their Christmas wish list.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: When Becky helps Harris keep a secret from Darlene, it causes a split between the two sisters.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: When Dan gets injured on the job covering D.J.'s vending machine route, the choice to sue the company could lead to D.J. getting fired.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: When Ben offers Mark free piano lessons, Darlene finds this as an opportunity to test his parenting skills. Meanwhile, Jackie throws Becky a baby shower.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: As Darlene grapples with a life-altering offer, a conversation with David turns her world more upside-down.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: After Emilio's deportation, Jackie takes on a paternal role crafting a birth plan for Becky; Darlene navigates a love triangle with David and Ben; Harris faces her own dilemma.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene struggles to decide between David and Ben; Becky begins to doubt herself as a mom; Mark gets in trouble at school when a picture of him and his boyfriend kissing goes viral

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris confronts Darlene's lifestyle; Jackie meddles in others' affairs to evade her own issues; Becky struggles with the expenses of parenthood, her family lends support.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Becky applies for a bartending job at Casita Bonita; Dan is concerned it could worsen her drinking.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: At Halloween, Jackie learns a shocking secret while trying to reopen the Lunch Box.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Jackie and Becky pitch their business plan to Darlene in hopes of getting the Lunch Box back, but Darlene's decision leads to hostility among the three.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Thanksgiving chaos erupts as Dan gathers the family; tensions rise over the Lunch Box; Harris surprises everyone with a bold move.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Jackie’s faced with a tough decision that brings the family and community together.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan is disappointed when everyone but Becky forgets about his birthday; Darlene faces another issue; Dan excludes Jackie from the family Christmas Santa photo for mistreating Louis

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The Conners resist Becky's Packers fan boyfriend; Dan emphasizes family loyalty to the Bears to Mark; Ben and Darlene seek a loan for their magazine.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene’s thrilled when Harris gets into Central Illinois State, but she may have other plans.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The Conners debate voting reasons; Louise's offer threatens to take her from Lanford, prompting family intervention in Dan's relationship.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan avoids grief until it confronts him; Ben and Darlene tackle baby fever; Dwight's nervous to fill in for an injured chef.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan connects with his half-brother but struggles with their father's unequal treatment; Jackie hits it off with a fun married couple.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene joins Price Warehouse for income; Jackie advances her relationship with Ron and Janelle; Ben alters his appearance for advertisers.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris returns home newly-unemployed; Becky seeks childcare; Jackie advises reaching out to Emilio's family; the family ponders tattoos.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Bev returns, wants to spread happiness with her money. She offers to fund Mark's coding camp tuition, but Darlene suggests giving it to Harris.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan’s ready to share his feelings with Louise; Darlene realizes how badly she wants a baby.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan and Louise deepen their bond amid the challenges of aging; Darlene's night in jail leaves Ben in charge of parenting; Mark's class experiment with a friend results in hickeys.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene and Ben hunt for apartments; Jackie, Becky, and Beverly Rose road trip to Mexico to meet her father; Dan confides financial woes to Louise.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The Conners are dealing with the pandemic and life's financial troubles; the Lunch Box is closed for everything but takeout and delivery.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mary is devastated that Halloween has been canceled by the city, so Darlene and Becky enlist Jackie and the rest of the family to create an unforgettable experience.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene isolates herself from her co-workers at Wellman Plastics, leaving them with the impression she is an elitist snob.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: It's Beverly Rose's first birthday -- but it's not all cake and candles -- when Becky and Emilio disagree on what kind of party they should have.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene's friendship with a manager at Wellman Plastics lands her in an awkward situation; Louise's brother tries to win over Jackie.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris's job is in jeopardy after joining a protest she strongly believes in, leading to tense discussions within the family.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Ben's mom arrives after an unexpected death and unveils shocking information from the past; Becky and Emilio spend more time together.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris brings home her new friend, Josh, leaving the family questioning his intentions; Becky and Ben's attempt to build a closet stirs up family drama.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene earns a promotion at Wellman Plastics, while Ben decides on a new career path; Jackie tries an herbal tea. and it leads to an emotional revelation.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Chuck's new purchase of a boat creates a rift; Darlene hires her first assistant at Wellman's Plastics but soon realizes she is anything but helpful.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene starts to feel the pressures of her new job; Dan attempts to help Ben out at the hardware store, but the two don't always agree on how to run the business.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mark is convinced he has COVID-19; Becky and Harris team up to confront Josh, who has been 'ghosting' Harris.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan feels helpless when Louise refuses to let him put himself at risk for her; when Jackie learns the competing restaurants are posting negative reviews.

programme.title: The Conners

programme.title: 1 vs. 100
programme.desc: Professional dancer Carrie Ann Inaba hosts this show in which a contestant can win $50,000. The contestant, known as the One, competes with a mob of 100 other players by answering questions. When the One answers correctly, each member of the mob that answered incorrectly is eliminated. The One earns money for each mob member who is eliminated. If the One can eliminate the entire mob, he wins $50,000. But if the One gets a question wrong, he is eliminated and the remaining mob members split his winnings.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.desc: One contestant from each team has their own lane on a giant treadmill hovering over a pool of water.

programme.title: The Biggest Loser US

programme.title: The Biggest Loser US

programme.title: The Biggest Loser US

programme.desc: The contestants head to Kauai for two weeks of extreme adventures and intense competition.

programme.desc: Fifteen brand new contestants, hand selected by the trainers, come to the Ranch as individuals.

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: In Leicester the team meet Paul, a personal trainer who would like to use his space for clients, as well as for relaxing with friends and family. Can the team give him an all-purpose garden that also takes into consideration his disability?

programme.title: Monty Don's American Gardens
programme.desc: Monty goes South to explore gardens of early independent America and learns how the history of this part of the country is still very much evident in the places and people he meets. He visits the famous garden where President Thomas Jefferson, one of America's founding fathers, enjoyed spending his time seeking out seeds and plants for his thousand foot vegetable garden.

programme.title: Monty Don's American Gardens
programme.desc: Monty goes South to explore gardens of early independent America and learns how the history of this part of the country is still very much evident in the places and people he meets. He visits the famous garden where President Thomas Jefferson, one of America's founding fathers, enjoyed spending his time seeking out seeds and plants for his thousand foot vegetable garden.

programme.title: Monty Don's American Gardens
programme.desc: Monty goes South to explore gardens of early independent America and learns how the history of this part of the country is still very much evident in the places and people he meets. He visits the famous garden where President Thomas Jefferson, one of America's founding fathers, enjoyed spending his time seeking out seeds and plants for his thousand foot vegetable garden.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty travels to Europe and explores the influence of the Venetians on gardening. To begin with, he explores Venice on one of the city's famous barges, stepping out to visit green spaces large and small that are often hidden from view behind high walls.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty begins in the city of Trieste, close to Italy's border with Croatia, to visit a public garden first created by an obsessive royal plantsman more than 150 years ago, which is now being carefully restored. He then heads down the Adriatic coast through Croatia to pick up the trail that the Venetians followed, ending his journey on the beautiful island of Lopud, near Dubrovnik.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty begins the last leg of his journey in Corfu, a Greek island with strong Venetian links, including olive trees planted by them that are still grown today. Here, Monty visits a spectacular garden made by an Englishman with Greek connections.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don conducts a personal grand tour around Italy's magnificent gardens from the luxurious retreats of the moneyed north to the lavish hideaways of the romantic south. In this episode, he's in and around Rome, a powerbase of emperors and popes, to explore gardens that are among some of the most extravagant and flamboyant ever created in history.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don is on a grand tour around Italy, this time visiting gardens both in Florence and around the sun-scorched Tuscan countryside. Monty discovers how, like a piece of sculpture, renaissance gardens were created as works of art, and how a group of Edwardian ex-pats mistakenly reinforced the idea that formal Italian gardens were flowerless.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don continues his grand garden tour of Italy. This time he is in Naples to visit some of the most sublime, romantic retreats in southern Italy. After all the formality of the green gardens around Rome and Florence, Monty seeks out idyllic horticultural gems set against the dramatic scenery of the Amalfi Coast to discover why, in the south, gardens are informal and, above all, filled with flowers.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don concludes his garden tour of Italy in the wealthy north where, in the Veneto and Lucca, extravagant pleasure gardens were created for flirtation and fun. In the Lakes, Monty meets up with the garden society, the Grandi Giardini Italiani, to peer over the fence at luxurious creations of the rich and famous. The journey ends on Lake Maggiore to see the most theatrical horticultural gem of Italy.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don visits some of the most famous and interesting gardens in France. Here, he tells the stories behind France's important historic gardens. These include elaborate walled gardens designed to please the mistress - and then the wife - of a King, and magnificent displays of flowers and fountains that involved thousands of soldiers moving tracts of land and incited violent jealousy in another monarch.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don turns to the French love of food and finds out how this has influenced their gardens. He travels to some of the most famous `potager' or kitchen gardens, where vegetables and flowers are planted together in elaborate and beautiful displays. He also talks to gardeners about this style of planting which has been copied the world over.

programme.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don travels to some of the most celebrated artists' gardens, including the one created by the impressionist Claude Monet, who planted and painted his garden for half his life. Monty also matches the paintings to the garden of Paul Cezanne, as well as visiting several contemporary artistic gardens to see how the use of plants and trees has evolved into new and varied styles.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty Don uncovers the extraordinary stories behind Britain’s seventeenth century gardens.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty visits influential gardens of the 19th Century, from royal retreats to the very first public parks.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty concludes his journey by looking at how the nation’s gardens have evolved over the last hundred years.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty assesses the progress, successes and failures of his paradise garden. Elsewhere, Frances Tophill travels to Glasgow to meet a gardener whose hands-off approach to his garden has reaped rewards for wildlife.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: The boys are still at the Dirty bird in Oklahoma, trying to get a few more tasks done before heading back to the Raven in Missouri. They also manage to get out and do a little velvet scouting with the Hawk spotting scope.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell are back on public land duck hunting with family and friends. After a tough scouting mission only finding a few birds the group goes for broke on new water and the Mallards pile in.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation
programme.desc: “Part of our responsibility as citizens in this country is to make sure we not only take care of these resources but we hand it off to the next generation in better condition that we found it.” -Bob Ziehmer, Senior Director of Conservation for Bass Pro Shops & Cabela's Join Bob in New Mexico as he talks about taking care of our natural resources for future generations. Special thanks to Express UU Bar Ranch

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Zach and Carson Wentz chase long beards throughout the Midwest.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Hunter Nelson has been dreaming of the day he’d get to tag his first buck. So, his father sets the stage by reconnecting with a long-time friend and ranch owner in Texas.

programme.title: HuntStand TIps and Gear
programme.desc: Custom building arrows is a great way to get the most from your overall bowhunting setup.

programme.title: Browning Films
programme.desc: Aoudad Country Part 2- Kyle Barefield and Cole Barthel from All Things hunting head to the Texas and Mexico border on a DIY Aoudad hunt where Cole is after his first Aoudad. After that Kyle teams up with good friend Chris Griffin where they head to another Ranch on the border and hunt two giant Aoudad rams with a rifles.

programme.title: Working Class Hunter
programme.desc: Stephen has a score to settle with a Missouri buck he missed two years ago. Now, during the rut and with snow on the ground, the chase is on. The woods come alive as Stephen hones in on his target. This is the hunt he’s been waiting for—don’t miss the moment when it all comes together.

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: A different perspective is taken as we follow along with two modern day hunting guides and find out why they do what they do.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: We explore the sophisticated world of the whitetail deer's senses, exploring how these remarkable creatures have evolved to pattern hunters through their keen sense of smell and heightened sensory awareness.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Dan Schmidt and Mark Kayser share insights into the natural behavior of whitetail bucks, particularly during the rutting season, and how scrapes play into their territorial and mating behaviors.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Renowned hunter Mark Kayser faces one of his most challenging hunts yet in the sparse woodlands of Nebraska.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Famed Social Media Influencer Leigh McClendon refuses to cave into the pressure of some of his followers who don't support his love of hunting big Whitetail Bucks.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: In this eye-opening episode, Dan Schmidt explores the fascinating science behind a whitetail deer's vision.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Anatomy Hunter Brian Johnson shares his meticulous research on deer anatomy and behavior, guiding Dan through the critical factors that determine the perfect shot placement.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In most cases, the cameraman or woman hunts as well… Often their “play time” happens between scheduled season hunts for the show. But why don’t we see those? This year, I made it a point to film all of my camera girl’s hunts and decided to make an episode out of it. Without help, none of this possible! So to all the camera operators, behind the scenes industry folks… Thank you and this is for you!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode we kick off with calling in a bird for the Bellator Light Heavyweight Champ, Corey Anderson on a farm in Kentucky. We roll up to Ohio and double up on a foggy morning, then it was back to Iowa where John linked up with Skyline Motorsports Crew Chief of the #16 Longhorn, Zeb to chase birds in NE Iowa. Another double to close out the season! 5 turkeys in the episode, Enjoy!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John competes in another Tactical Games event in Pennsylvania and a Total Archery Challenge. If you’re not familiar with these…. The Tactical Games is a cross fit meets 2 Gun style competition. The TAC events are a big Archery 3D fun shoot with targets ranging from 15 to 120 yds! If you’ve never done one of these, DO IT!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John travels to Arizona at the end of June for an OTC Rifle Elk hunt! This rare opportunity due to Arizona opening a summer tag on private and state land allows non residents to obtain a chance at a velvet bull! High temps and high anticipation are filled with this hunt!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: John heads back to Kentucky once again!! After moving away in 2016, John hasn’t connected on a KY buck since! If it could go wrong, it went wrong! But, optimism is high this year on a new piece of property his buddy from high school just bought! Short window to get this hunt in before the western swing kicks in too! Can he get it done and break the bad luck?

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, we travel with John back to Colorado. A familiar spot where he has tagged out before on Mule Deer with a bow. Back for the third year as he tries to keep the streak going! Several stalks go out the window before he closes in on a target buck at 44 yds! Will he keep the luck on his side?

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation
programme.desc: “Part of our responsibility as citizens in this country is to make sure we not only take care of these resources but we hand it off to the next generation in better condition that we found it.” -Bob Ziehmer, Senior Director of Conservation for Bass Pro Shops & Cabela's Join Bob in New Mexico as he talks about taking care of our natural resources for future generations. Special thanks to Express UU Bar Ranch

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: The Road Trips crew heads southward to Texas to hunt with Mike Stroff. As usual, Riley Green breaks the ice with the first buck of the trip. Then, Tyler Jordan is right behind him with a tall-tined 10 of his own. Austin Riley is in camp, too. The train keeps rolling.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Si Robertson and Justin Martin from @DuckCommanderOfficial hunt with Lee Ellis and Kendell Golightly with @seekone8708 during the @realtree Max-7 pro staff Hunt in Louisiana. Lee, on his first duck hunt, is hoping to learn quickly and become the official goose guy of the outdoors while Uncle Si tries not to shoot the decoys!?!

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: It's day No. 3 of the opening-week deer hunt in Nebraska, and the Road Trips Crew is on a roll. Chipper Jones continues his hunt for Mr. Perfect, Michael Pitts spots a shooter, and Bryan Brown moves stands in hopes the move will pay off.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan takes his sister Graycen hunting the day after Christmas on Realtree Farms in Georgia. Graycen is going after a big 8-pointer that showed up in the last few days on trail cameras.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell head north to the Dakotas to get a jump on the 2019 duck season with Ed McDonough and friends. Stale weather and too much water make field hunting a bust, but a cold front and a pothole covered in birds quickly changes the tempo and helps the crew ring in the new season in style.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: This week's episode takes place at the famed Honey Brake in Louisiana. Drake White kicks things off with a big 8-pointer, capping off an amazing comeback story for him. Riley Green continues his hot streak and takes a target buck. Finally, Tyler Jordan rounds out the incredible trip with his best buck ever. It's a giant typical.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell meet a new friend at the boat ramp. The group teams up in the timber. Then, an afternoon scouting trip pays off as the pair finds new water and new ducks.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Anna set out for a last minute fishing trip that runs a little late. They take a quick detour to the parent pick up line to get the kids from school, and head back out on the water to see what’s biting!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh takes his friend Isaiah to the blue water as they look for destin's latest hot bite, the blackfin tuna.

programme.desc: Rush and Ali head to La Paz Mexico to fish with longtime friends and soak up some Baja living in the City of Peace. In part one of this two part series, the guys fish offshore targeting striped marlin and dorado with a few surprises.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Ali & Rush look back on the adventures of the year and revisit the concept behind Local Knowledge.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The word is out! The Southern California Bluefin Tuna fishing is on fire and the waters of San Diego are literally Foaming with Life. Ali and Rush switch their targets from the jumbo size Bluefin Tuna to a smaller, medium grade fish for non-stop run and gun action. But, with so many fish fixated on the masses of bait in the area, it may take a million casts to pull one out of the froth.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoors
programme.desc: Capt. Blair goes back to Marco Island with Capt. Chris Broome to tackle the beautiful inshore spots before heading offshore the next day.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew heads to Rivers Lodge and Hunt Club in Kansas to fish strip pits. Trenton and Rex take on Mike and Nate in a 3 period mini tournament. With multiple species allowed including northern pike, the two teams are neck and neck after the first two periods. Due to bad weather on day 2, period 3 turned into a hour speed round where only keeper largemouth count.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: From country music star Brian Kelley’s big 56’ Sunny Briggs Sportfishing Yacht, to getting caught in a storm aboard a small Hurricane deck boat in the Gulf of Mexico, this episode of Stomping Grounds has host Ryan McVinney exploring boat culture in Florida’s Panhandle region, from the Emerald Coast to The Big Bend and the Forgotten Coast. Brian Kelley, aka “Beach Cowboy”, or BK for short, makes up one half of the country music group Florida Georgia Line (FGL) and has just released his own solo album Sunshine State of Mind. Kelley invites viewers aboard his vessel the “Brittney Marie” which was named after his wife, for a look at the couple’s Stomping Grounds. Songs from his album play on the boat’s sound system - including a tune about shopping for a boat on Boat Trader

programme.title: Primos
programme.desc: Team Primos chases whitetail deer at our home camp, Kudzu Bluff, on the edge of the MS Delta.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: There's nothing in the world like waking up and hitting the Sweet November woods. That said, make sure you're applying the right hunting tactics for the right time of year.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John travels to Arizona at the end of June for an OTC Rifle Elk hunt! This rare opportunity due to Arizona opening a summer tag on private and state land allows non residents to obtain a chance at a velvet bull! High temps and high anticipation are filled with this hunt!

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson's next adventure takes him west to Nevada for a giant bull elk with an early rifle elk tag in his pocket. As a non-resident, Mark had less than a 1% chance to draw this tag with Worldwide Trophy Adventures (WTA) TAGS Program. This is why he loves the tag system, you never know when you're going to get a tag. This area provides one of the best elk tags in the state of Nevada. Mark is bringing his brand new Gunwerks Nexus 300 PRC rifle to the high mountains of the Nevada desert.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation
programme.desc: “Part of our responsibility as citizens in this country is to make sure we not only take care of these resources but we hand it off to the next generation in better condition that we found it.” -Bob Ziehmer, Senior Director of Conservation for Bass Pro Shops & Cabela's Join Bob in New Mexico as he talks about taking care of our natural resources for future generations. Special thanks to Express UU Bar Ranch

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: John Sewell has played a huge part in the development of feeding Fortified Cottonseed 365 days a year. Laramie Barrett of Fortified Cottonseed joins John for a great weekend of hunting at his ranch in Uvalde, Texas. This is a great time for Laramie to get away from the office and see the first hand of how their product is performing.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: This is the story of how FE Hill ranch got it's start. From its inception, FE Hill has created opportunities for people to experience the outdoors and create memories. For us, it has created a tradition of Fathers and Sons hunting together.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Nobody chases the waterfowl migration as hard as Shawn Stahl of Team Winchester. The Michigan native spends over half of his year running the highways and flyways searching for the x. In this episode, we’ll tag along with Shawn and his crew with their Winchester pumps in hand as they hunker down hiding in fields and timber in hopes of locked wings from ducks and geese.

programme.title: The Break
programme.desc: Todd Hogan is Bustin’ Beaks during Missouri’s 2021 and 2022 turkeyseasons and Chasin’ Tails in the 2020 deer season.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation
programme.desc: Shane Mahoney has dedicated his entire life to the conservation of wildlife. His Hope is for human kind to come to value the landscapes and the wildlife that lives on those landscapes. His Hope is that we come to value the wild products that we are still able to harvest from the land and the habitats that we have protected - before we forget generationally how important and beautiful it is.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: ConQuest Scents travels to the ATA show and releases their new Heat Seeker product to the public. After ATA they head home to the farm and start building a new addition to the main facility.

programme.title: TRP
programme.desc: Today we’re having a conversation with Zeb Hogan, the author, biologist, and television host known for his show "Monster Fish." In this episode, Hogan shares his experiences with the show, his upcoming book "Chasing Giants: In Search of the World's Largest Freshwater Fish," and his insights into the world of freshwater biology. Hogan's show "Monster Fish" takes viewers on a journey around the globe to explore the largest and most elusive freshwater fish in the world. programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Similar to any good Cajun dish, a successful duck camp requires preparation. The last day on dry land is filled with essential stops to get ready for 5 days on the Bayou. Whether making sure we have the right ingredients for our favorite meals, or getting the boats brushed up and ready for action, the day before can be just as important as the day of.

programme.desc: Tyler and Sara use Northland's new Pitchin’ Puppet for summer time Walleyes!

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: In this episode, Mark Peterson continues his adventure in Argentina. For this leg of the journey, he is chasing after Water Buffalo, Wild Boar and Axis Deer. Argentina's borders were closed during the peak of COVID, so these animals have not been hunted for two years, which led to a game rich environment and excellent trophy quality. Mark and his guide Charly are in the action right away and it doesn't take long for them to spot the animals they were looking for and make their move.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson is still in Argentina but has moved locations from La Pampa to Patagonia in search of a Pere David's Deer. Pere David's deer are native to China but thrive in the wet swamps of Argentina. In the heart of the Red Stag roar, Mark and team put on the miles for two days before they catch up to a giant Pere David's Buck.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson’s Journey in Argentina continues with some morning madness. Taking four animals, this is one of the best morning hunts he has had yet. After an already incredible week of hunting, Mark is looking for a few species that caught his attention earlier in the trip and turns up a Hybrid Sheep, Hybrid Mouflon, Feral Goat and a Multi Horn Sheep. Temps are abnormally hot in Argentina for this time of year and the animals will be heading for cover by mid day to stay cool. Mark and his guide Charley make a plan to cover a lot of ground in hopes of catching them out feeding before they disappear.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Hunting off the northeastern coast of Australia on Marble island could be one of the most beautiful sceneries in the world. Mark Peterson takes the 38 hour trip to Australia only to arrive in camp and have enough time to change and hit the ocean coastline looking for Axis & Javan Rusa deer.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: This week Mark continues his hunt in Australia on Marble Island. After a successful first day, the group heads out the next morning in search of a Sambar stag. After closing the distance Mark isn’t able to get a steady rest so they move in closer while the Sambar stag is on the move.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: If you ask Mark Peterson what his all time most memorable hunt is, he would likely say that it's anything he's done with his kids. That answer would quickly be followed up with "Blue Sheep Hunting in Pakistan, hands down". Here, Mark takes you back to 2017 to the first (and still only) filmed hunt for Blue Sheep in Northern Pakistan. It's ironic that his most challenging and physically brutal hunt is also the one that holds the number one spot in Mark's hunting career. Enjoy this second of three episodes as he pays tribute to Sheep Week, 2022. Click the link below to join and learn more about The Wild Sheep Foundation.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: While releasing a defeated tarpon healthy after an epic battle is the ultimate victory, everything else is measured in heartbreak and degrees of failure. For Justin, putting Ethan on his first silver king requires patience and a tasty diversion by a local chef.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin takes a fellow guide on his new boat to see how it measures up. Using only public waypoints on his Humminbird unit, they find exploring to be as much fun as it is fruitful.

programme.desc: We follow along as a decommissioned ship is sunk to create a new artificial reef, much to the delight of divers and anglers. Plus, Adapt-Able SCUBA makes underwater adventure possible for those who didn’t think it was.

programme.title: Working Class Hunter
programme.desc: Stephen has a score to settle with a Missouri buck he missed two years ago. Now, during the rut and with snow on the ground, the chase is on. The woods come alive as Stephen hones in on his target. This is the hunt he’s been waiting for—don’t miss the moment when it all comes together.

programme.desc: A different perspective is taken as we follow along with two modern day hunting guides and find out why they do what they do.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: We explore the sophisticated world of the whitetail deer's senses, exploring how these remarkable creatures have evolved to pattern hunters through their keen sense of smell and heightened sensory awareness.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Dan Schmidt and Mark Kayser share insights into the natural behavior of whitetail bucks, particularly during the rutting season, and how scrapes play into their territorial and mating behaviors.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: In this eye-opening episode, Dan Schmidt explores the fascinating science behind a whitetail deer's vision.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Anatomy Hunter Brian Johnson shares his meticulous research on deer anatomy and behavior, guiding Dan through the critical factors that determine the perfect shot placement.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In most cases, the cameraman or woman hunts as well… Often their “play time” happens between scheduled season hunts for the show. But why don’t we see those? This year, I made it a point to film all of my camera girl’s hunts and decided to make an episode out of it. Without help, none of this possible! So to all the camera operators, behind the scenes industry folks… Thank you and this is for you!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode we kick off with calling in a bird for the Bellator Light Heavyweight Champ, Corey Anderson on a farm in Kentucky. We roll up to Ohio and double up on a foggy morning, then it was back to Iowa where John linked up with Skyline Motorsports Crew Chief of the #16 Longhorn, Zeb to chase birds in NE Iowa. Another double to close out the season! 5 turkeys in the episode, Enjoy!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John competes in another Tactical Games event in Pennsylvania and a Total Archery Challenge. If you’re not familiar with these…. The Tactical Games is a cross fit meets 2 Gun style competition. The TAC events are a big Archery 3D fun shoot with targets ranging from 15 to 120 yds! If you’ve never done one of these, DO IT!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: John heads back to Kentucky once again!! After moving away in 2016, John hasn’t connected on a KY buck since! If it could go wrong, it went wrong! But, optimism is high this year on a new piece of property his buddy from high school just bought! Short window to get this hunt in before the western swing kicks in too! Can he get it done and break the bad luck?

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, we travel with John back to Colorado. A familiar spot where he has tagged out before on Mule Deer with a bow. programme.desc: Rush and Ali head to La Paz Mexico to fish with longtime friends and soak up some Baja living in the City of Peace. In part one of this two part series, the guys fish offshore targeting striped marlin and dorado with a few surprises.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Ali & Rush look back on the adventures of the year and revisit the concept behind Local Knowledge.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The word is out! The Southern California Bluefin Tuna fishing is on fire and the waters of San Diego are literally Foaming with Life. Ali and Rush switch their targets from the jumbo size Bluefin Tuna to a smaller, medium grade fish for non-stop run and gun action. But, with so many fish fixated on the masses of bait in the area, it may take a million casts to pull one out of the froth.

programme.title: Life On The Water

programme.title: Life On The Water
